pattern_description: Account 3 feature page views within 3 days + webinar attendance; prior opp lost <2y.
Account high-intent content (asset/video) + email thread includes executive CC within 12 days.
High Intent Asset: "Demo Video" or "Request a Demo" or "Case Study" or "Pricing Page" or "Compeitive Comparision Content"

pattern_description: Opp inactivity 14 days + competitor intent surge in last 30 days; opp open.
Renewal <4 months + new leadership  and compeitive intent surge within 45 days existing open
Account attended live or virtual event + visited pricing or feature pages within 7 days; create opportunity.
New contact from different department engages with product page + prior opp closed won <12m, open new opp
No web activity 60+ days → sudden spike in intent (>80) and 3+ page views in 5 days; existing opp
Opp open >45 days + sentiment-negative email detected + competitor content viewed; existing opp
Multiple users from same account download same asset within 5 business days; open new opp
Prospect visits  comparison page 2+ times within 14 days; no current opp, high compeittive intent; new opp
Opp inactive >21 days + email mentions “budget” or “next quarter” + competitor intent >60; existing opp
Renewal <90 days + account owner change or exec transition detected; existing opp
Opp email thread unanswered >14 days; existing opp
Multi contacts visits integration or API documentation + product overview within 5 days; create new opp
Pricing page visit followed by demo request within 3 days; create new opp
Analyst or peer comparison report downloaded + feature page viewed within 7 days; create new opp
Visits competitor comparison page + case study within 7 days; no open opp; create new opp
Identified intent keyword surge (e.g., “best X vendors”) followed by site visit within 3 days; create new opp
Retargeting ad click → product or pricing page visit within 48 hours; create new opp
Listens to on-demand podcast or webinar replay, then engages with product content within 7 days; create new opp
Pricing provided with competitor intentent surge; existing opp
POC or negotiation stage with leadership change; existing opp
